# Specialized Proteins
SolGov's greatest scientists have specialized two types of proteins, taking the environement into account! Each one heals a specific damage subtype better at certain body temperatures.
[textlink="Please click here to see the full list of proteins available." link="Protein"]
[color=red]USE CAUTION[/color] when using the aforementioned proteins. Should they mix together, the result will cause cellular damage to the patient, resulting in the need for Stabilization Proteins.
To avoid this, make sure the patient is done metabolizing one brute medication before giving them another. Keep an eye on the rate their health is changing.
# Temperature SolGov's scientists have also specialized two types of chemicals that will be used to modify the body temperature of a patient! Keep a note on what temperatures each protein requires for the damage subtype your patient has.
